title: The 10 best sales you can shop online this week
text:
The 10 best sales you can shop online this week

Shop and save this week at your favorite retailers. (Photo: Staub / JCrew)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

Sometimes the amount of sales happening online can feel overwhelming. From price drops on random household items to discounts at some of your favorite fashion retailers, there are tons of sales on a given day. But some are better than others—and that's where we come in.

More: 15 things you shouldn't wait until Black Friday to buy

Here at Reviewed, we're constantly scouring the internet for the best sales to shop (not to mention, which ones to avoid). Here are some of our favorites that we've seen happening for the week of October 21, 2019.

1. Get an extra 25% off at REI Outlet

Get great deals at REI Outlet. (Photo: REI Outlet)

Stock up on all your favorites now during this sale happening at REI Outlet. From now until October 23, you can get an extra 25% off on outdoor gear from KUHL, Marmot, prAna, and Outdoor Research. It's a great time to buy, and while you're on the site, you can also save on already discounted warehouse items, like Hydro Flasks and more.

Save an extra 25% at REI Outlet

2. Get up to 70% during the Head Start Holiday sale at Wayfair

Get a jumpstart on your holiday decorations at Wayfair. (Photo: Wayfair)

From the best artificial Christmas trees to mantel decor, stockings, and galore, the holiday sale happening at Wayfair right now is a great chance to grab all you need to make the most of your holiday season. You can save up to 70% on select products that'll keep you feeling merry well into the new year.

Shop at Wayfair

3. Take 20% off any single item or get $5 3-day shipping at Spirit Halloween

Spirit Halloween is the place to get the hottest costumes of the year. (Photo: Spirit Halloween)

Halloween is right around the corner, and if you haven't figured out your costume yet, it's time to get on that. Spirit Halloween stores are a go-to for most people, especially if you want to try a costume on before buying it, and they're also a fun spot to shop for spooky decor and party accessories as well. Right now, you can save 20% on a single item with the code TAKE20 or choose 3-day shipping for just $5 with the promo code 3DAY if you buy online.

Shop the Spirit Halloween sale now

4. Save up to 75% on select items at Sur la Table

Sur la Table is the best way to upgrade your kitchen now. (Photo: Sur la Table / Staub / Instant Pot)

You can upgrade your kitchen and make every meal feel more complete with this sale that's happening at Sur la Table now. From Instant Pots to stemless wine glasses and more, you can get up to 75% off now during their Warehouse sale, which is still happening. If you're looking for some more creep-tastic additions to your kitchen or dining room, you can also get up to 30% off on Halloween-themed items, like this Nordic Ware Skull Pan and this Staub Pumpkin Cocotte.

Shop and save up to 75% during the Warehouse sale

5. Get spooky for Halloween and save at Home Depot

This Halloween sale at Home Depot is spooky good. (Photo: The Home Depot)

You know that house on the block that always had the scariest decorations around Halloween when you were growing up? That could be your house this year thanks to this Halloween sale going on Home Depot. You can save up to 30% off on select decorations online, including these flickering light lanterns that'll make it easy for trick-r-treaters to find their way to your door, this adorable inflatable pumpkin patch, these spooky witches, and more.

Shop the Halloween decor sale at Home Depot

6. Get more savings during the Madewell sale-on-sale

Shop the Madewell sale happening now. (Photo: Madewell)

The Madewell sale-on-sale is still going on, and if you're as in love with the brand's denim and totes as we are, you know it's the perfect time to stock up while you can. Right now, you can get an extra 30% off at Madewell using the promo code BESTNEWS. You can get everything from cardigans to outerwear, dresses, shoes, and more, so it's also a great chance to give your wardrobe a refresh.

Take an extra 30% off sale styles at Madewell

7. 40% off: Select FILA, Adidas, and Champion gear at Urban Outfitters

Stay on-trend at Urban Outfitters. (Photo: Fila / Adidas)

Urban Outfitters is like Anthropologie's younger, trendier little sister, and you can snag apparel and accessories from some of the most on-trend brands around now if you shop online. Today is the final day to get up to 40% off on brands like Champion, FILA, Adidas, and more. From shoes to those iconic Champion sweatshirts, now's the time to get your cute 90s throwback looks at a good discount.

Shop and get up to 40% at Urban Outfitters now

8. Stock up on deals at J.Crew

Stay chic at J.Crew. (Photo: J.Crew)

Looking for classic, preppy apparel to wear to work? J.Crew's got you covered. For a short time, you can even get up to 40% off select boots, sweaters, outerwear, and more online using the promo code BUNDLEUP. You can also get up to 25% off everything else.

Save a bundle at J.Crew

9. Deal alert: Houzz is discounting tons of dining room furniture

Drinks anyone? (Photo: Houzz)

Dining rooms are a crucial part of most homes, serving as a space where everyone in the house can meet, hang out, eat meals, play board games, and unwind after a long day. If your dining room has been in need of an upgrade, you're going to love this sale at Houzz, since you can get up to 70% off select dining room furniture.

Save up to 70% on select dining room furniture

10. Get up to 50% on almost everything at Shutterfly

Print out your most cherished photo memories with Shutterfly. (Photo: Reviewed / Jackson Ruckar)

From an engagement to a birth announcement and so much more, your most important moments deserve to be immortalized forever. Right now, you can save up to 50% on everything plus get one free 8x8 photo book using the code FREEPB at Shutterfly, our favorite photo printing service. You can can also get free shipping on orders over $49 with the promo code SHIP49, so it's a great time to snap and save.

Save at Shutterfly now

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for the latest deals, reviews, and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
